version_name: 4.3.1•    Bug fixesWhat’s New in Version 4.3•    Optimized for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus•    Apple Watch app shows quick company insights•    Customer signatures on estimates and invoices (new on iPhone)•    Updated Profit & Loss report (new on iPad)•

4.3.3•    Support for new sign-in security featuresWhat’s New in Version 4.3•    Optimized for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus•    Apple Watch app shows quick company insights•    Customer signatures on estimates and invoices (new on iPhone)•    Updated Profit

4.4•Multicurrency transaction support (QuickBooks Online Plus & Essentials)•Refresh bank and credit card feeds on-demand•Bulk modify transactions in bank feeds •Improved support for negative prices and rates

4.4.3•    Viva Brazil! QuickBooks Online is now available to Brazilian companies. What’s New in Version 4.4•    Multicurrency transaction support (QuickBooks Online Plus & Essentials)•    Refresh bank and credit card feeds on-demand•    Bulk modify transa
4.5•    Add new bank and credit card feeds•    Switch companies without signing out•    Sign-in

version_description:
• QuickBooks Payments users: Improved GoPayment card reader experience including support for EMV chip cards
• Import customers from your device contact list

• Accept online card and bank transfer payments with QuickBooks Payments! Visit Settings to sign up.
• QuickBooks Payments users: Get notified when your customers pay invoices online
• Continuous improvements and fixes

• UK and AU companies can now accept online card and bank transfer payments with PayPal! In addition, get notified when your customers pay invoices online with PayPal. To enable, visit Apps in QuickBooks on the web and turn on the PayPal app.
• Continu

• New invoice design to help you see the most important details at a glance and get paid faster. Let us know what you think!
• New users get step-by-step payment processing details on invoices, additional guided next actions, and new invoice insights o
• Continuous improvements and fixes
• Continuous improvements and fixes

• Select the bank account that funds are deposited to when creating an invoice payment or sales receipt. The default is Undeposited Funds, which you can select for cash and checks you deposit later.
• Updated design for estimate and expense details.

• Guided next actions and details on invoices to help you get paid faster, plus new invoice insights on the dashboard
• Updated design for sales receipts
• Continuous improvements and fixes

• Guided next actions and details on invoices to help you get paid faster, plus new invoice insights on the dashboard
• Customize your invoices with a logo, color, and footer
• Updated design for sales receipts
• Continuous improvements and fixes

• Customize your invoices with a logo, color, and footer

• Customize your invoices with a logo, color, and footer
• Updated design for sales receipts
• Continuous improvements and fixes

• Add attachments from iCloud and file apps such as Dropbox, Google Drive, and OneDrive
• Plus subscribers can now mark expenses as billable
• All US companies can now record bank deposits. If you get paid with cash or check in person, record a bank

• Export sales transactions to iCloud, Dropbox, Google Drive, and OneDrive
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Export sales transactions to iCloud, Dropbox, Google Drive, and OneDrive
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Enhanced date range filters in Expenses and Profit & Loss

Find what you need faster with a brand new navigation. Your menu is now on the bottom right so it’s easier to reach. Plus, the new Shortcuts tab puts your most-used tools front and center, with bold icons and big, easy-to-tap buttons. Or switch to the All

The brand new cash flow center makes it simple to track your cash flow and plan for the future. Know exactly how much cash you have, get personalized insights, and forecast your future cash flow to be ready for upcoming expenses.

We've made some general maintenance fixes to continue running your business as easy as possible.

- Fixed the issue when subscribing from the settings screen would sometimes cause the app to be unresponsive
- Fixed multiple crashes

- Fixed an issue that would sometimes prevent users from connecting their bank

- Fixed an issue that would sometimes prevent users from adding a new item

- We fixed an issue where the business purpose was missing from trips.
- We fixed crashes related to expenses and payments.

We squashed multiple bugs, including an issue with items.

We fixed a bug related to displaying invoices.

We made multiple fixes and improvements. Now you can:
- Change your vehicle with a tap when reviewing trips.
- Track the status of your QuickBooks Debit Card right from your dashboard.

Updated to iOS 14? Now you can add a mileage widget to your device’s home screen. See your recent trips at a glance and tap to review them instantly.

New for accountants: Now there's a faster, easier way to switch between clients.
